## Useful Info

**Ancient champions** are dangerous [undead](/Undead "Undead") foes with powerful spellcasting abilities and good weapons and armour. They can be found in [the Crypt](/The_Crypt "The Crypt") and [the Iron City of Dis](/The_Iron_City_of_Dis "The Iron City of Dis").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                            |                                                     |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") (3d26) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Haste](/Haste "Haste")                    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- All ancient champions are considerable threats in melee, wearing [plate armour](/Plate_armour "Plate armour")/[chain mail](/Chain_mail "Chain mail") and wielding well-enchanted, branded two-handed weapons, in addition to being able to haste themselves.
- Despite their deadliness and solid defenses, they don't have terribly high HP; The irresistible damage from [Dispel Undead](/Dispel_Undead "Dispel Undead") or [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction") in particular will take care of these very easily.

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), they could have one of two possible spell sets:

  - [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining") (3d21), [Stone Arrow](/Stone_Arrow "Stone Arrow") (3d21), and [Haste](/Haste "Haste")
  - [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") (3d26), [Pain](/Pain "Pain") (d15), and [Haste](/Haste "Haste")

- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), ancient champions had a spell set with [Haste](/Haste "Haste"), [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast"), and [Slow](/Slow "Slow").

- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), they had a spell set with [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt") and [Haunt](/Haunt "Haunt").

- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), ancient champions were a variant of [skeletal warriors](/Skeletal_warrior "Skeletal warrior") that were only found in one specific vault.

Useful Info

Ancient champions are dangerous undead foes with powerful spellcasting abilities and good weapons and armour. They can be found in the Crypt and the Iron City of Dis.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Iron Shot (3d26) Wizard flag
Slot2 Haste Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • All ancient champions are considerable threats in melee, wearing plate armour/chain mail and wielding well-enchanted, branded two-handed weapons, in addition to being able to haste themselves.
  • Despite their deadliness and solid defenses, they don't have terribly high HP; The irresistible damage from Dispel Undead or Lee's Rapid Deconstruction in particular will take care of these very easily.

History

  • Prior to 0.27, they could have one of two possible spell sets:
    • Bolt of Draining (3d21), Stone Arrow (3d21), and Haste
    • Iron Shot (3d26), Pain (d15), and Haste
  • Prior to 0.19, ancient champions had a spell set with Haste, Iskenderun's Mystic Blast, and Slow.
  • Prior to 0.18, they had a spell set with Venom Bolt and Haunt.
  • Prior to 0.13, ancient champions were a variant of skeletal warriors that were only found in one specific vault.
